column2: "Na Israel faa dza ɔwɔ nyinara sii mu
column4: na ɔbɔɔ afɔr maa n’egya Isaak ne Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn kasaa kyerɛɛ Israel wɔ anafua nyikyerɛ mu

column4: w’egya ne Nyankopɔn: mma nnsuro dɛ ebɔkɔ Egypt; na mebɛyɛ wo ɔman kɛse wɔ hɔ:"

column2: "menye wo bɔkɔ Egypt; na medze wo efi hɔ aba bio so ampaara: na Josef dze n’abaw mu na ibowu ada."
"Na Jakob soɛree fii Beer-seba: na Israel ne mba no twuuw hɔn egya Jakob
column5: wɔ ntseaseanam a Farao maa wɔdze baa dɛ wɔmfa mbɛfa no no mu."

column3: nye hɔn ahodze a wonyaa no wɔ Keenan asaase do no
column5: Jakob nye n’asefo nyinara a wɔka no ho:"

column3: nye ne mbabanyin hɔn mbabanyin ka no ho
column4: ne mbabaa nye ne mbabanyin hɔn mbabaa
column5: nye n’asefo nyinara na wɔka no ho na ɔnye hɔn baa Egypt."

column2: "Na Israel ne mba a wɔbaa Egypt no hɔn edzin nye yi
column3: Jakob nye ne mbabanyin: Jakob n’abakan Reuben."

column8: Keenannyi ɔbaa bi ne ba no."

column6: nye Zera: mbom Er nye Onan dze
column7: wowuu Keenan asaase do. Na Perez ne mbabanyin nye Hezron na Hamul."

column2: "Woyinom nye Leah ne mbabanyin a ɔwoo hɔn maa Jakob wɔ Paddan-aram nye ne babaa Dina: ne mbabanyin nye ne mbabaa nyinara yɛ akra eduasa ebiasa."

column6: nye hɔn akyerɛbaa Sera: na Beria ne mbabanyin; Heber

column2: "Woyinom nye Zilpa a Laban dze no maa ne babaa Leah no ne mbabanyin
column3: na woyinom na ɔwoo hɔn maa Jakob; wɔyɛ akra duesia."

column2: "Jakob ne yer Rahel ne mbabanyin; Josef nye Benjamin."
"Na wɔwoo Manaasɛ nye Efraim wɔ Egypt asaase do maa Josef
column3: On ɔsɔfo Potifera ne babaa Asenat woo hɔn maa no."

column2: "Woyinom nye Rahel ne mbabanyin a wɔwoo hɔn maa Jakob: hɔn nyinara wɔyɛ akra duanan."
"Woyinom nye Bilha a Laban dze no maa ne babaa Rahel no ne mbabanyin na woyinom na ɔwoo hɔn maa Jakob: hɔn nyinara wɔyɛ akra esuon."
"Akra a wɔnye Jakob kɔr Egypt a wofi n’asen mu nyinara
column3: sɛ Jakob ne mbabanyin hɔn yernom nnka ho a
column4: akra no nyinara yɛ eduosia esia."

column2: "Na Josef ne mbabanyin a wɔwoo hɔn maa no wɔ Egypt no wɔyɛ akra beenu: Jakob ne fie akra a wɔbaa Egypt no nyinara
"Na ɔsomaa Juda ma odzii n’enyim kan kɔr Josef hɔ
column3: ama oeebedzi n’enyim akyerɛ no Gosen kwan; na wɔbaa Gosen asaase do."
na ɔkɔree kehyiaa n’egya Israel kwan wɔ Gosen; na ɔdze noho kyerɛɛ no
column5: na osui wɔ no kɔn ho ara ma ɔkyɛɛr kakra."

column3: Menya mehu dɛ eda ho ara etse ase yi dze

column7: nye m’egya ne fifo a wɔwɔ Keenan asaase do no aba me nkyɛn:"

column3: na mbowa na wɔnyɛn; na wɔdze hɔn nguan
Ofitsi hɛn mbofra mu dze bɛpem ndɛ ara wo nkowaa mbowa ara na yɛnyɛn
column5: nye hɛn egyanom nyinara: ama hom aatsena Gosen asaase do; osiandɛ oguanhwɛfo biara yɛ ekyiwadze ma Egyptfo; wɔnye nguanhwɛfo nndzi afora."
